attributes.action: use whatever influence he has to ensure a George Medal is awarded to Adam Mapleson
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Adam Mapleson was shot on 26th May 2007 as he went to the aid of a female security guard who was attacked as she refilled a cash machine. Mr Mapleson has subsequently been released from hospital and it is to be hoped that he will make a complete recovery.

We the undersigned feel strongly that Mr Mapleson's conspicuous bravery should be rewarded with a significant civilian award.
